translation.artworkTitle: Use individual picture elements to create your very own European work of art and share it with others.
translation.collectionTitle: Open the door to new paintings, sculptures and photographs that perfectly match your taste.
translation.startSubtitle: Discover the most beautiful collection objects from museums, galleries, libraries and archives from various European countries.
translation.startText: Be inspired by the artistic diversity of Europe!
translation.startTitle: Welcome to the glittering world of GLAMorous Europe!
